entry.title: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 13 at 10:46AM CST until November 14 at 3:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Aransas Islands, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and Calhoun Islands Counties. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 3 AM CST Tuesday.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands

entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued November 13 at 1:33PM MST until November 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities and Strong Gusty Winds could cause erratic fire behavior. * AFFECTED AREA:
entry.cap:areaDesc: Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Natrona County, Casper BLM

entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued November 13 at 1:23PM MST until November 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, AND 317... .Gusty southwest winds and very low relative humidity are resulting in red flag conditions across portions of northeast Wyoming. These critical fire weather conditions will continue
entry.cap:areaDesc: Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains
